    def c1, 1, 0, 9.99999975e-006, 100000
    def c3, 10, 4, -3, 0.5
    def c4, 0.300000012, 0.589999974, 0.109999999, 65504
    def c5, 0.5, 1.5, 0.25, 0.0078125
    def c6, 1, 2, 3, 15
    def c19, 14.9998999, 0.05859375, 0.234375, 0.0625
    def c20, 0.001953125, 0.064453125, 0, 0
    dcl_texcoord v0.zw
    dcl_texcoord1 v1
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3
    dcl_2d s4

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s13


// Unreal light shaft fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --git --auto-fix-unreal-light-shafts --only-autofixed CRC32_6D624F04_0.txt
texldl r7, c220.z, s13
mov r6, c13 // TextureSpaceBlurOrigin
mad r6.x, r7.x, c220.w, r6.x // Adjust each eye by 1/2 separation

    max r0.xy, v1.zwzw, c10
    min r1.xy, c10.zwzw, r0
    texld r0, r1, s3
    rcp r0.w, r0.w
    mul_sat r0, r0.w, r0.zzxy
    mul r1, c1.xxyy, v1.xyxx
    texldl_pp r1, r1, s0
    add r1.w, r1.w, -c2.y
    add r2.x, -r1.w, c1.z
    rcp r1.w, r1.w
    cmp r1.w, r2.x, c1.w, r1.w
    mov_pp r2.x, c0.x
    mad_pp r2.x, c2.x, r1.w, -r2.x
    mul_pp r1.w, r1.w, c2.x
    min_pp r2.y, r1.w, c4.w
    mul_sat_pp r1.w, r2_abs.x, c0.y
    pow_pp r2.z, r1.w, c0.z
    mov r3.xy, c1
    cmp_pp r1.w, r2.x, c7.y, r3.x
    min_pp r3.z, r2.z, r1.w
    max_pp r1.w, c0.w, r3.z
    cmp_pp r2.z, -r2.x, c1.y, c1.x
    cmp_pp r2.x, r2.x, -c1.y, -c1.x
    add_pp r2.x, r2.x, r2.z
    mul_pp r1.w, r1.w, r2.x
    mul_sat r1.w, r1.w, c3.x
    lrp_pp r4, r1.w, r0, r1.zzxy
    dp3_pp r0.x, r4.zwyw, c4
    mul_pp r0.x, r0.x, c3.z
    exp_pp r0.x, r0.x
    mul_sat_pp r0.y, r0.x, c8.w
    mul_sat_pp r0.x, r0.x, c15.x
    texld r1, v0.zwzw, s1
    mul r1, r1.zzxy, c8.zzxy
    mul_pp r1, r1, c3.y
    mad_pp r1, r1, r0.y, r4
    mov r0.zw, c12
    mad r0.yz, v0.xzww, -r0.xzww, r6.xxyw
    dp2add r0.y, r0.yzzw, r0.yzzw, c1.y
    rsq r0.y, r0.y
    rcp r0.y, r0.y
    mul_sat r0.y, r0.y, c3.w
    mov r4.xy, c5
    mad r0.z, c11.w, -r4.x, r4.y
    texld_pp r4, v0.zwzw, s2
    mul_pp r0.w, r4.w, r4.w
    mul_pp r4, r4.zzxy, c16.zzxy
    mul r4, r0.x, r4
    lrp r2.x, r0.w, r0.z, c11.w
    lrp r3.z, r0.y, c1.x, r2.x

    mul r0.x, r0.x, c14.x
    lrp_pp r2.x, r0.x, c1.x, r3.z
    mul_pp r0, r1, r2.x
    mad_pp r0, r4, c3.y, r0
    mad_pp r1.xyz, r0.zwyw, c9.y, c9.x

    rcp r4.w, r1.y
    rcp r4.xy, r1.z
    mul_sat_pp r0, r0, r4
    mul r1.xyw, r0.xwzz, c19.xzzy
    frc r0.x, r1.x
    add r0.x, -r0.x, r1.x
    mad r0.y, r0.y, c6.w, -r0.x
    mad r1.x, r0.x, c19.w, r1.w
    add r4, r2.y, -c18
    cmp_pp r4, r4, c1.y, c1.x
    mad r3, c18.xxyz, -r3.yxxx, r2.y
    mad_sat_pp r0.xzw, r2.y, c17.w, -c17.xyyz
    cmp_pp r2, r3, r4, c1.y
    dp3_pp r1.z, r2.yzww, c6
    dp3_pp r0.x, r2, r0.xzww
    add_pp r0.z, r1.z, c1.x
    mad r2.x, r1.z, c5.z, c5.w
    mad r3.x, r0.z, c5.z, c5.w
    mov r3.yz, c20.xxyw
    add r3, r1.xyxy, r3.yxzx

    texld_pp r3, r3.zwzw, s4
    lrp_pp r5, r0.y, r3, r4
    mov r2.yz, c20.xxyw
    add r1, r1.xyxy, r2.yxzx

    texld_pp r1, r1.zwzw, s4
    lrp_pp r3, r0.y, r1, r2
    add_pp r1, -r3, r5
    mad_pp oC0, r0.x, r1, r3
